name: TermiteCsv

screenshots.caption: The welcome screen and the toggling of the ui
The ui is active and a board has been rendered, note the URL has been updated, this can be used for direct links.
The ui is active and a thread has been rendered, note the URL has changed, this can be used for direct links

short_description:
A TextBoard software which runs on a command line interface, was an experiment to see if anything could actually be built on a command line emulator in Javascript.

While the big cats in Forum / TextBoard let the server lump the load and render the page up for the user - TermiteCsv uses JS to let the user render the page on their machine.

You can easily fork this to make your own thing, the code is messy and poorly shoved together as I write this stuff in my free time on boring evenings.

Original code snippet it all stemmed from: 
http://bililite.com/blog/2012/12/20/javascript-command-line/
summary: Text Board which runs on the basis of a Command line interface
